entries.original: Tag normalization for Telegram (`@username`) and Discord (`@here`, `@everyone`, numeric IDs, `role:<id>`)
entries.translation: Telegram (`@username`) 및 Discord (`@here`, `@everyone`, 숫자 ID, `role:<id>`)에 대한 태그 정규화

entries.original: New CLI test coverage for tag list config mutations
entries.translation: 태그 목록 구성 변경에 대한 새로운 CLI 테스트 커버리지

entries.original: Session-end callback notifications now prefix summaries with configured tags
entries.translation: 세션 종료 콜백 알림이 구성된 태그로 요약을 접두사로 추가

entries.original: Documentation updates in `README.md`, localized READMEs (`ko/ja/es/zh`), and `docs/REFERENCE.md`
Version bumped to 4.2.0 across package/plugin/docs metadata
